quiz.question: Which blood type can receive red blood cells from any ABO type without ABO incompatibility?
Which antibody pattern appears in reverse blood typing to confirm ABO group?
options: Patient serum reacts with known A and B cells
Patient serum reacts with Rh cells
Patient serum reacts with K cells
quiz.answer: Patient serum reacts with known A and B cells

quiz.question: Which blood group allele variation results from single nucleotide polymorphisms in ABO exon sequences?
options: Subgroup alleles of A and B from SNPs
quiz.answer: Subgroup alleles of A and B from SNPs
